data.name: Kong Summit
data.description: Learn how service mesh and Kubernetes can support deployment of enterprise microservices, and how edge computing, APIs and serverless help you scale.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: TechBash 2020
relatedRecords.description: At TechBash, attendees will take their skills to the next level, learning from experts who share their knowledge in a fun, collaborative, and inclusive environment. TechBash is focused on Web, Cloud, DevOps, Architecture, Best Practices, Soft Skills, and much more. We provide 3 full days of keynotes…

relatedRecords.name: GDG DevFest Modesto & Berkeley
relatedRecords.description: Hey GDGers, we know October is a long ways out, but we’re super excited to bring you the first DevFest to be hosted in Modesto (and our second partnering with GDG Berkeley)! Location is TBD, but the date will be October 19, 2019 so mark your calendars now and get ready for a day full of awesome tech…
